page.title: 10EVERGREENS
page.content: "Evergreens" is a club for the elderly in the village of Ullesthorpe.The members meet regularly,once a fortnight,and make a monetary contribution which helps to pay for their afternoon tea of bread and butter,cakes,biscuits and tea to drink. The men play card games while the ladies chat and find out all the latest{news}in the village. Occasionally{outings}are organised to places of interest,amd a recent coach trip visited Matlock Bath in Derbyshire. The club provides a valuable service for some elderly people who would otherwise not get out of their houses to meet other people.
